critique: This document is an amendment to a departmental rule regarding exceptions from examination in the Department of the Treasury. It specifically adds an expert in mechanical designs and diagramming commercial and financial facts to the list of positions excepted from examination in the Bureau of Statistics. Given the limited scope and nature of the document, it's difficult to assess its stance on broad political issues. It doesn't directly address ideological tilts, immigration, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most axes would be scored as neutral. The document seems primarily administrative in nature.
